about_me:
My name is Lim and I like to think of my self as a software developer. Started in 2015 where I wrote my first SQL report. Now I spend most of my time writing Groovy Script in SAP CLoud Integration Platform.
I have a passion for creating things, whether it developing applications / process within the business, building my own dining table or cooking a sunday meals for my family.
Creating things and having people appreciate your work is what drives me.
